name: WORLDS AT WAR
detailed_description:
Patch!

Input issues for non-joystick users should now be addressed. If you are still having issues, please consider asking for support before giving a bad review. Joystick support disabled temporarily to fix some issues.


About the Game

Worlds At War thrusts the player into the aftermath of an alien invasion. A small multi-national ragtag group of surviving fighter pilots and crew man a small carrier-group, roaming the oceans and trying to survive against all odds. The game features diverse fully pilotable aircraft, helicopters and boats, and players must learn to master them in order to defend the carrier-group from a relentless onslaught of alien attack-waves in a unique combination of some of mankinds best military equipment facing off with alien space-ships. -3 Settings -3 Pilotable vehicle-types -Horde-mode and Free Flight -Through the Early Access process, more scenarios and vehicle-types will be added with the help of feedback from the community! Caution: This is an intense experience, with smooth movement and rotation of player-camera. Stay in external views if you are sensitive to VR-nausea. If you are Very sensitive, this may not the game for you in VR. It is also in Early Access, and as such is it not a fully finished product. Your support will help shape it. Enjoy!

short_description:
Control airplanes, helicopters and combat-boats as you defend your carrier from a relentless alien onslaught! A sim-light horde-mode game drawing inspiration from the early arcade games, re-interpreted in Full VR!

Caution: This is an intense experience, with smooth movement and rotation of player-camera in VR.
